body:
Well to you guys that didnt know... Im a builder :D

So I signed up on a ''Job Interview'' about making a new spawn to a server ^_^  (Im not gonna say wich server it is) They gunna pick out 5-6 ppl to do dis job :D So I signed up ...
 And know Im waiting for a mail to come to me and give me the answer. If Im making it ... Im gunna be gived a challenge :O I gotta build whatever they say ...  Its gonna be hard ( I Think ) And then, when Im done, Im gonna get the final mail ^_^ 


 Wish me good luck :D

( I KNOW ITS A LOT MISSPELLED WORDS)

Im gunna give an update if Im making it ♥

title: Crossing meh fingers :0
